author: Russ H

review: Easy to use with chromecast app!!! Love it
author: Krista L. Carpenter

review: Love it! rated 4 stars because I hoped it had some sort of screen-casting feature for streaming android game play on my tv, latiency or not it would be a nice feature since we play many mobile MMO games with friends at our house). Wishful thinking I guess haha.We've had this for a few months and it's been a joy to have in the house, on our larger hdtv it heats up a lot, which had me worried at first, but given the manual states that it's "normal" I guess I don't have to worry about my tv catching fire? After months of it being plugged in and daily use that isn't an issue!
author: Eben

review: Met all my streaming media needs in a compact package. Plus setup was easy to understand and friendly.
